channel.title: Some Common SIMPLE Errors To Fix
channel.description:
Ok, people who post here check this first.
[b][u]Some Common Errors[/u][/b]
BIG [size=15pt]BIG [/size][size=30pt] BIG [/size] ERROR!
[code]client.java:15124: illegal start of expression private boolean packetProcess() { ^ client.java:23358: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineX[] = {2893,2921,2911,2926,2899}; ^ client.java:23359: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineY[] = {4846,4846,4832,4817,4817}; ^ client.java:23367: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineRX[] = {3253,3105,2681,2591}; ^ client.java:23368: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineRY[] = {3401,9571,3325,3086}; ^ client.java:23375: illegal start of expression public boolean stairs(int stairs, int teleX, int teleY) { ^ client.java:26139: illegal start of expression public int Publicchat = 0; ^ client.java:26141: illegal start of expression public void pmstatus(int status) { //status: loading = 0 connecting = 1 fine = 2 ^ client.java:32839: ';' expected } ^ client.java:32840: '}' expected ^ 10 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
All that means is you are missing a bracket somewhere. Check what you recently added!
[b]Rule of Thumb:[/b] [i]Every [b]{[/b] Needs a [b]}[/b][/i]
[b][u]Another COMMON Error[/u][/b]
[b]public boolean/ public int ------- Symbol not found...[/b]
That means the boolean/int you called for was not found.
[b]Leechers:[/b] Look on the tutorial you leeched to see if you missed something [b]Coders:[/b] Simply Declare A Int or a Boolean
BOOLEANS: Look Like This [b]public boolean teleOtherScreen = false;[/b] ALWAYS KEEP IT AT FALSE INTS: Look Like This [b]public int teleReq = 0;[/b]
[b][u]BUT NOT ALWAYS[/u][/b]
[u]Common [b];[/b] Error[/u]
[u]';' expected[/u]
Press [b]Cntrl + G[/b] and search for the line it says Look at the line above that and make sure if it needs a [b];[/b] It has one!
They are always after actions EX: addItem, sendMessage.
[b][u]UNCLOSED LITERAL [/u] [/b]
That means you forgot a [b]"[/b] Remember sendMessage's 95% of the time need a [b]" [/b] at front and back EX: sendMessage([b]"[/b]TEXT GOES HERE[b]"[/b])[b];[/b]
addItem(Item ID, Item Amount);
------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=30pt]HOPE I HELPED SOMEONE[/size]

item.title: Some Common SIMPLE Errors To Fix
item.dc:creator: @boomer216 boomer216
item.description:
@boomer216 wrote:

Ok, people who post here check this first.

Some Common Errors

BIG [size=15pt]BIG [/size][size=30pt] BIG [/size] ERROR!

client.java:15124: illegal start of expression private boolean packetProcess() { ^ client.java:23358: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineX[] = {2893,2921,2911,2926,2899}; ^ client.java:23359: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineY[] = {4846,4846,4832,4817,4817}; ^ client.java:23367: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineRX[] = {3253,3105,2681,2591}; ^ client.java:23368: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineRY[] = {3401,9571,3325,3086}; ^ client.java:23375: illegal start of expression public boolean stairs(int stairs, int teleX, int teleY) { ^ client.java:26139: illegal start of expression public int Publicchat = 0; ^ client.java:26141: illegal start of expression public void pmstatus(int status) { //status: loading = 0 connecting = 1 fine = 2 ^ client.java:32839: ';' expected } ^ client.java:32840: '}' expected ^ 10 errors Press any key to continue . . .

All that means is you are missing a bracket somewhere. Check what you recently added!

Rule of Thumb: Every { Needs a }

Another COMMON Error

public boolean/ public int ------- Symbol not found…

That means the boolean/int you called for was not found.

Leechers: Look on the tutorial you leeched to see if you missed something
Coders: Simply Declare A Int or a Boolean

BOOLEANS: Look Like This public boolean teleOtherScreen = false; ALWAYS KEEP IT AT FALSE
INTS: Look Like This public int teleReq = 0;

BUT NOT ALWAYS

Common ; Error

‘;’ expected

Press Cntrl + G and search for the line it says
Look at the line above that and make sure if it needs a ; It has one!

They are always after actions EX: addItem, sendMessage.

UNCLOSED LITERAL

That means you forgot a "
Remember sendMessage’s 95% of the time need a " at front and back EX: sendMessage("TEXT GOES HERE");

addItem(Item ID, Item Amount);

[size=30pt]HOPE I HELPED SOMEONE[/size]

Read full topic
item.source: Some Common SIMPLE Errors To Fix
